name: Simulation of the collection of garbage
name_original: Simulation of the collection of garbage
description:
A random simulation of the collection of garbage, made for Low Effort Jam 20

Controls:

  • Horizontal arrow keys to rotate camera
  • Vertical arrow keys to move
